name: Mega Man X Innocent Impulse
description:
Version 0.2 coming January 2023!

Mega Man X Innocent Impulse is a story-rich open-world Mega Man X fangame in active development. Featuring an enhanced 8-bit graphical style and soundtrack.

It's A.D. 21XX. Set after the Repliforce War from Mega Man X4. The Repliforce was wrongly accused of being Mavericks during the incident, the public doesn't trust the Maverick Hunters anymore and demand for change. In the midst of it all, a new threat appears that causes Reploids to act erratically. Are these Reploids truly cyber-rebels or just victims of a bigger plot? Help the blue Reploid hero Mega Man X discover the truth of the Innocent Impulse incident!

  • An open-world adventure starring Mega Man X!
  • Find and develop new abilities with the Chip Parts System!
  • 8 new bosses! Multiple endings! Can you find the truth?
  • Relive past battles from the "Mega Man X" series and polish your Maverick Hunter skills with the VR Space Simulation System!
  • Several Armor Parts for X to equip! Can you find them all?

(Features are a work in progress and might not be currently available in their entirety in the most recent version of the game)
